author: jshlee
body:
Now that GEM emapping is in DB, we can set this as default for run2_GEM_2017.
 - removed run2_GEM_2017_MCTest, we will use run2_GEM_2017 only now
 - set DB unpacker as default for run2_GEM_2017
 - fix a small bug in GEMDigiToRawModule.cc

This needs DB with GEMELMapRcd like 100X_mc2017_realistic_v4 for run2_2017.

we will need to backport to 10x

@kpedro88 @arunhep @perrotta @hyunyong
title: GEMDigiForRun2
